meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tsunami</radical> in the shape of a <radical>dragon</radical> flies off the cliff, then comes crashing down to the ground. This skinny tsunami of water flying down to the ground is a <kanji>waterfall</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: Despite how cool a dragon <kanji>waterfall</kanji> is, to be honest it's also pretty <reading>tacky</reading> (たき).
